name: Generate dynamic PDF from XPF files
short_description: PHP and VB6 classes for generating dynamic PDF reports and forms from XPF files designed with Visual2PDF. PHP class uses TCPDF to generate PDF from Visual2PDF documents. VB6 class uses optimized mjwPDF class to generate PDF.
